title: Shockblade zed Chroma pack shadows don't match
body: I saw some footage of the new shockblade Zed chroma gameplay on the PBE and I was wondering when Riot will fix the issue that the shadows are those of the regular zed skin and not those of the shockblade skin. I find it very ugly and weird that the shadows don't match the skin please fix before releasing.

replies.body:
Hiya! 

Shockblade Zed is still in development, and we haven't made a call if the shadows will be changing yet or not.
